expired:
Hello [[name]], We noticed that your internet package [[package]] has expired. To reactivate your account, please make a payment of [[price]] using Till number ...... alternatively you can login into your account at yourcompany.freeispradius.com.
Regards your company.
reminder_7_day:
Hello *[[name]]*, 
your internet package *[[package]]* will expire in 7 days. Use till number (enter your payment details) to make a payment. Kindly ignore if you have already paid. Regards (your company name).
reminder_3_day:
Hello *[[name]]*, 
your internet package *[[package]]* will expire in 3 days. Use till number (enter your payment details) to make a payment. Kindly ignore if you have already paid. Regards (your company name).
reminder_1_day:
Hello *[[name]]*,
your internet package *[[package]]* will expire tomorrow. Use till number (enter your payment details) to make a payment. Kindly ignore if you have already paid. Regards (your company name)
